Title: Relates to the regulation of live restraint cable devices to take wildlife
Summary: Regulates the use of live restraint cable devices to take wildlife; authorizes regulations by the department of environmental conservation.
LawCode: Amd ยง11-1101, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the regulation of live restraint cable devices to take wildlife; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
